summary:
"I cast off these petty illusions! Behold, the true vision of the Lord of Hell!"
Belial, Diablo 3
descriptionHtml:
A quick preset of  a slightly more traditional Hades. Not dolled up, with scene kid hair, but definitely not some brute who looks like he met the wrong end of Zeus' ugly stick. This was built on a Ningheim race, but works fine with nords, bretons, imperials, and redguards. I assume for the most part it will work on any human-esque race, it kinda works on elves, but as one would expect it gets kinda weird.

The only real requirements for this are
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]Apachii Hair[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]

Everything else (eye color, skin texture, eyebrows)
can be changed according to whatever you like best.

For eyes I use
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66630/?]Loks Eyes[/url]
And brows I use
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
Better scars
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?]Northborn Scars[/url]


Various other shit shown in screenshots
Reinforced ebony armor (I can't link because it's not a nexus mod)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60789/?]Reshaped Ebony Armor[/url] (for bigger ebony armor)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21705/?]Dark Nemesis Armor[/url] (for better ebony retex)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83486/?]Quest-line equipment[/url] (for cooler stalhrim armor)



ENB
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23812/?]Seasons of Skyrim[/url]



Also, if you tweak him for your own personal preference, post a screenshot, I'd love to see it!
author: HellbentHades
